docs.text: MkDocs Bootstrap Theme This project provides a Bootstrap theme is for the MkDocs project. Installation Install the theme with pip: pip install mkdocs-bootstrap After the theme is installed, edit your mkdocs.yml file and set the theme name to bootstrap : theme: name: bootstrap Example This documentation is rendered with the Bootstrap theme.
docs.title: Home
